i downloaded this and it doesn't have sound...

Glad this finally surfaced. Thanks for posting.

Sound works fine for me. writeniceletters, maybe try downloading the latest version of Windows Media Player....at least that worked for me. Maybe the player you are using doesn't support AC3. Something worth checking into.

I found the quality to be fine. Good video, but I agree with allyk2000 "Sound isn't perfect but who cares!!" The sound isn't bad, just not high quality. 

Movie is great. Very visually pleasing and a great connection to the words of the Beatles songs. Movie is a must for any fan of the Beatles. Of course this is an opinion, so take it with a grain of salt. We all have different taste.
it says the video is a DIVX format... maybe using Divx player would make the sound better?? hmmmm? im dling now so ill found out in a while

no u dont because it is in .avi format
windows media player should be able to open it, im not 100% sure because idk wat version u have

EXCELLENT MOVIE. A 'MUSICAL' WITH BEATLES' MUSIC ENTIRELY THROUGHOUT. EXCELLENT ARRANGEMENTS, HARMONIES...STORY IS GOOD. NEW AND REFRESHING MOVIE. MAY BE FOR MORE MATURE AUDIENCE SUCH AS COLLEGE GRADS; PROFESSIONALS.
